articles.title: Donald Trump to remain on Colorado ballot after judge dismisses lawsuit
articles.description: A judge rules she does not have the power to bar the Republican frontrunner from the presidential ballot.
articles.content: Similar challenges, based on a US Civil War-era constitutional amendment, have also failed in three other states.
